feed.title: Vince Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Vince: v1.11.2
entry.content:
vince is a self hosted alternative to google analytics.

To install macos and linux curl -fsSL https://vinceanalytics.com/install.sh | bash

Docker docker pull ghcr.io/vinceanalytics/vince

Changelog

Other work

  • c34ef351a099df2911eed8d498eb59c382b98706 fix acme key prefix
